title: Integrated Pharmacology Education Based on Student-Led Objective Tutorials (SLOT)

context.prior_knowledge: Basic pharmacological concepts and comprehension of healthcare systems
context.additional_context: A practical pharmacy application skills enhancement program for working professionals.

learning_goals: Learners can explain drug mechanism of action with 80% accuracy by analyzing real clinical cases.
Learners establish and execute self-directed learning plans with 90% participation using the SLOT method.
Learners write drug treatment protocol proposals with 100% completion through PBL team projects.
Learners achieve teamwork performance capabilities of 4.0/5.0 or higher through peer evaluation.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
